metadata.title: CVE-2016-0802 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - high
metadata.description: The Broadcom Wi-Fi driver in the kernel in Android 4.x before 4.4.4, 5.xbefore 5.1.1 LMY49G, and 6.x before 2016-02-01 allows remote attackers toexecute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) viacrafted wireless control message packets, aka internal bug 25306181.

criterions.comment: linux-mako: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-flo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
